Documentation for the cern-snow-client library¶

The CERN ServiceNow Client library (CERN SNow Client) facilitates the usage of the ServiceNow REST API with a CERN account via Single Sign On authentication. Basic Authentication is also supported.

Low level operations such as get, post and put are implemented. Also, other higher level operations have been implemented, such as querying/inserting/updating records, or querying/inserting/updating incidents and requests, including adding comments and work notes.

You can find below the documentation for the different modules:

  • cern_snow_client package
    • cern_snow_client.session module
    • cern_snow_client.record module
    • cern_snow_client.task module
    • cern_snow_client.incident module
    • cern_snow_client.request module
    • cern_snow_client.common module
  • tests package
    • tests.test_session_basic_auth module
    • tests.test_session_sso_oauth module
    • tests.test_session_base module
    • tests.test_record_basic_auth module
    • tests.test_record_sso_oauth module
    • tests.test_record_base module
    • tests.test_record_field module
    • tests.test_task_basic_auth module
    • tests.test_task_sso_oauth module
    • tests.test_task_base module
    • tests.test_incident_basic_auth module
    • tests.test_incident_sso_oauth module
    • tests.test_request_base module
    • tests.test_request_basic_auth module
    • tests.test_request_sso_oauth module
    • tests.test_request_base module
    • tests.test_base module
